thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Police Probe Girl’s Death for Child Abuse

author: Zolan Kanno-Youngs
title: Police Probe Girl’s Death for Child Abuse
text:
New York City police are investigating whether a 3-year-old who died on Monday night in the Rockaways was a victim of child abuse, police officials said on Tuesday.
Police found Bella Edwards, 3, in her apartment on Beach 105th Street with “possible signs of abuse,” NYPD officials said. Her stepfather, whom police declined to name, was giving CPR to the “unconscious and unresponsive” Bella when officers arrived at about 6 p.m. on Monday, officials said. The stepfather was the only other person in the house.
